org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.partition.consumer

类 RemoteInputChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.partition.consumer.InputChannel
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.partition.consumer.RemoteInputChannel
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    BufferListener, BufferRecycler

    public class RemoteInputChannel
extends InputChannel
implements BufferRecycler, BufferListener
    An input channel, which requests a remote partition queue.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  RemoteInputChannel.BufferReorderingException

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private java.util.ArrayDeque<Buffer> availableBuffers
      The current available buffers including both exclusive buffers and requested floating buffers.
      private ConnectionID connectionId
      The connection to use to request the remote partition.
      private ConnectionManager connectionManager
      The connection manager to use connect to the remote partition provider.
      private int expectedSequenceNumber
      The next expected sequence number for the next buffer.
      private InputChannelID id
      ID to distinguish this channel from other channels sharing the same TCP connection.
      private int initialCredit
      The initial number of exclusive buffers assigned to this channel.
      private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean isReleased
      Flag indicating whether this channel has been released.
      private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean isWaitingForFloatingBuffers
      The tag indicates whether this channel is waiting for additional floating buffers from the buffer pool.
      private PartitionRequestClient partitionRequestClient
      Client to establish a (possibly shared) TCP connection and request the partition.
      private java.util.ArrayDeque<Buffer> receivedBuffers
      The received buffers.
      private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger senderBacklog
      The number of unsent buffers in the producer's sub partition.
      private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger unannouncedCredit
      The number of available buffers that have not been announced to the producer yet.

    • 字段详细资料

      • id

        private final InputChannelID id
        ID to distinguish this channel from other channels sharing the same TCP connection.

      • connectionId

        private final ConnectionID connectionId
        The connection to use to request the remote partition.

      • connectionManager

        private final ConnectionManager connectionManager
        The connection manager to use connect to the remote partition provider.

      • receivedBuffers

        private final java.util.ArrayDeque<Buffer> receivedBuffers
        The received buffers. Received buffers are enqueued by the network I/O thread and the queue is consumed by the receiving task thread.

      • isReleased

        private final java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean isReleased
        Flag indicating whether this channel has been released. Either called by the receiving task thread or the task manager actor.

      • partitionRequestClient

        private volatile PartitionRequestClient partitionRequestClient
        Client to establish a (possibly shared) TCP connection and request the partition.

      • expectedSequenceNumber

        private int expectedSequenceNumber
        The next expected sequence number for the next buffer. This is modified by the network I/O thread only.

      • initialCredit

        private int initialCredit
        The initial number of exclusive buffers assigned to this channel.

      • availableBuffers

        private final java.util.ArrayDeque<Buffer> availableBuffers
        The current available buffers including both exclusive buffers and requested floating buffers.

      • unannouncedCredit

        private final java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger unannouncedCredit
        The number of available buffers that have not been announced to the producer yet.

      • senderBacklog

        private final java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger senderBacklog
        The number of unsent buffers in the producer's sub partition.

      • isWaitingForFloatingBuffers

        private final java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean isWaitingForFloatingBuffers
        The tag indicates whether this channel is waiting for additional floating buffers from the buffer pool.

      • sendTaskEvent

        void sendTaskEvent(TaskEvent event)
            throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: InputChannel
        Sends a TaskEvent back to the task producing the consumed result partition.

        Important: The producing task has to be running to receive backwards events. This means that the result type needs to be pipelined and the task logic has to ensure that the producer will wait for all backwards events. Otherwise, this will lead to an Exception at runtime.

        指定者:
        sendTaskEvent 在类中 InputChannel
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • recycle

        public void recycle(MemorySegment segment)
        Exclusive buffer is recycled to this input channel directly and it may trigger notify credit to producer.
        指定者:
        recycle 在接口中 BufferRecycler
        参数:
        segment - The exclusive segment of this channel.

      • getNumberOfAvailableBuffers

        public int getNumberOfAvailableBuffers()

      • notifyBufferAvailable

        public boolean notifyBufferAvailable(Buffer buffer)
        The Buffer pool notifies this channel of an available floating buffer. If the channel is released or currently does not need extra buffers, the buffer should be recycled to the buffer pool. Otherwise, the buffer will be added into the availableBuffers queue and the unannounced credit is increased by one.
        指定者:
        notifyBufferAvailable 在接口中 BufferListener
        参数:
        buffer - Buffer that becomes available in buffer pool.
        返回:
        True when this channel is waiting for more floating buffers, otherwise false.

      • notifyBufferDestroyed

        public void notifyBufferDestroyed()
        从接口复制的说明: BufferListener
        Notification callback if the buffer provider is destroyed.
        指定者:
        notifyBufferDestroyed 在接口中 BufferListener
